section.heading: District retirement benefits.
section.text: The District shall provide retirement benefits to all employees first employed after September 30, 1987, who would otherwise have been covered under the Civil Service Retirement System pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 8331 except those specifically excluded by law or by rule.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(g), 34 DCR 5079

annoGroup.heading: Section References
